name: Biggerplate
tag_list: mindmap, mindmanager, mind-map, library, mindmapping, buzan, mindjet
overview:
Biggerplate is an online mind map library and community.

The map library contains thousands of mind map examples and templates that are available to view and download for free. The library currently supports mind maps created using MindManager, iMindMap, XMind, and MindGenius mapping software. The content covers a broad range of subjects in both business and education, and the content is organised into categories for easy browsing.

The Biggerplate community is made up of mind mappers from around the world, and is over 25,000 members strong as of December 2011.

Biggerplate also provide a range of training services to help organisations large and small to take advantage of mind mapping as a tool to help improve creative thinking, innovation, collaboration and planning.
